thread.section_title: News24, South Africa's premier news source, provides breaking news on national, world, Africa, sport, entertainment, technology & more.
thread.title: Where are they now?

author: news24.com
title: Where are they now?
text:
Jacob Zuma’s road to the presidency was paved for him by a tightly knit group. But the members of that group have now turned on each other, writes Mondli Makhanya
ANC president Jacob Zuma’s group of supporters sing and dance outside the Pietermaritzburg High Court on September 12 2008. Fractures have appeared in this group, which has become a shadow of itself
Long, long ago, when clichés were acceptable in the newspaper world, the caption on the above picture would have read: In happier times.
